name: Cream dory Bellpepper Basil
description: This Cream dory Bellpepper Basil recipe is perfect for those seeking a high-protein, low-carb meal. It's healthy, with a focus on fresh flavors from basil and bell pepper, making it a great choice for anyone looking to enjoy a healthful and delicious meal.

recipeInstructions.text: Crack the eggs into a bowl and whisk until fully beaten.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Season the Pangasius fillet with salt and pepper to taste.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Chop the fresh basil leaves finely.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Place the Pangasius fillets in a baking dish.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6

recipeInstructions.text: Pour the beaten eggs over the fillets, ensuring they are well covered.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 7

recipeInstructions.text: Sprinkle the grated cheddar cheese on top of the egg-covered fillets.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 8

recipeInstructions.text: Bake in the preheated oven for about 20 minutes, or until the fish is cooked through and the cheese is golden brown.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 9

recipeInstructions.text: Garnish with freshly chopped basil leaves before serving.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 10
